snippet: Allowing Plan B One-Step to be sold over the counter to girls and women of all ages is a significant step forward, but several concerns remain.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Obama administration's announcement that it will take steps to allow version of so-called morning-after pill, known as Plan B One-Step, to be sold over the counter to girls and women of all ages; contends that the only lingering concern about availability of drug is whether price will remain barrier for many women with limited ability to pay.
lead_paragraph: Allowing Plan B One-Step to be sold over the counter to girls and women of all ages is a significant step forward, but several concerns remain.

headline.seo: An Important Victory on Morning-After Pills
headline.main: An Important Victory on Morning-After Pills
headline.print_headline: An Important Victory on Morning-After Pills
